PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-04562005-03-24HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ROBERT J. PERRY of Regina, Saskatchewan, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Merla Beckerman, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
